sentences: Marcus replaced original drummer Derrick Bostrom, for the band's 2006 reunion.
He was present on their 2007 reunion album Rise to Your Knees and its follow-up Sewn Together.
He left the band in late 2009.
Marcus was an Audio Engineer and Sound Designer for National Recording Studios and Clack/Hothead Studios, both of New York City.
He also served as Senior Sound Designer and Mix Engineer for the design agency Ultrabland, an Emmy Award-winning production house in New York City.
In 2016, Marcus joined SuperExploder, a custom designed audio facility in NYC's Chelsea neighborhood.
